translation.en: And I'm a map with a mouth.
♪ Grab your backpacks, let's go ♪ ♪ Jump in, vámonos ♪
translation.ko: 백팩을 챙겨서 가자! 얼른 타, 친구들!

translation.en: Dora! Diego! It's time for dinner.
But, Mami, we're about to explore.
Besides, Diego has to be up early tomorrow.

translation.en: He's moving to the city, remember? His mom has a new job.

translation.en: Dora, what did we say about dressing up Boots?

translation.en: He's a wild monkey, honey. He's not meant to be in human clothes.

translation.en: -[Cole] This is delicious! -[Diego] Wow, this is good.
She-- She'll grow out of it.
[Elena] Don't start. Just gotta let it go.
Parapata is a great Inca legend.
[Elena] Explorers for hundreds of years have been searching for it in vain.
translation.ko: 탐험가들이 수백 년이나 찾아 헤맸지만, 허사였어

translation.en: And, well, ever since we moved here to the jungle,

translation.en: we've been trying to find it.
Stories say there's more gold there than the rest of the world combined.
translation.ko: 온 세상 금을 다 합친 것보다 더 많이 있다는 얘기가 있어

translation.ko: 그러면 우리가 그 금을 찾으면 가져도 되는 거예요?

translation.en: We want to document Parapata for archeological purposes.
translation.ko: 우린 고고학적인 이유에서 파라파타를 기록하려는 거야

translation.en: See, we're explorers, we're not treasure hunters.
And as explorers, well, then the discovery of new places…
Uh, treasure hunting bad, exploring good.
translation.ko: 보물 사냥은 나쁘고 탐험은 좋은 거야

translation.en: [Diego] I bet the lost city of Parapata has golden statues of jungle cats.

translation.en: And monkeys. Like Boots. Monkeys are the best.

translation.en: No way! Jaguars are way cooler.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼! 재규어가 훨씬 멋지지

translation.en: Monkeys can swing and climb and talk to us.

translation.en: No, they can't. Boots isn't talking to you.

translation.en: I know better! I'm older than you.

translation.en: I think you're just yelling at me because you're sad you're leaving.

translation.en: Of course that's why I'm yelling at you.
Hi! I'm Dora! And I'm being chased by a herd of angry pygmy elephants.

translation.en: [Dora] Better luck next time, angry elephants.

translation.en: Today, we continue our decades-long search for Parapata.

Uh. Could you maybe go and get Mami and Papi for me?
Hey, now can I see the statue?

translation.en: Honey, you scared us to death today. If Boots hadn't found us--

translation.en: I mean, the markings, they look like some sort of…
Wait, why aren't you guys… -more excited? -Uh…
-You guys figured it out, didn't you? -What?
-We did? Oh… -We never use the red tack.
-You know where it is! -We should have waited on the red tack.
translation.ko: 그게 어딘지 아시네요! - 빨강 압정은 너무 서둘렀어 - 확실히 잘못했네

translation.en: -Definitely, definitely bad call. -Okay, we did figure it out.
translation.ko: - 빨강 압정은 너무 서둘렀어 - 확실히 잘못했네 그래, 알아냈어

translation.en: -[laughs] -The Inca reached an area in Peru that nobody thought was possible.

translation.en: I'm sorry, sweetie, you're just not ready, and you proved that to us today.
translation.ko: 미안하지만 넌 아직 아니야 그걸 오늘 증명해 보였고

translation.en: No, no, no, I'm ready, Mami-- I'm sorry, but we've made up our minds.
you do know the jungle. It's a part of you.

translation.en: -But you're all alone out there. -And why is that a bad thing?
translation.ko: - 하지만 정글에선 혼자잖아 - 그게 왜 나빠요?

translation.en: Because we won't always be there to pull you up.
Go to the city. Make friends.
[Elena] Dora, hurry! You have a flight to catch.
[Dora] But I don't want to go to the city.
-I won't know anyone there. -You'll know your family.
translation.ko: - 거긴 아는 사람도 없고 - 친척과 가까워질 거야

translation.en: Yeah, you used to be so close to Diego. I'll bet he's missed you, too.
translation.ko: 그래, 디에고랑도 친했잖아 걔도 네가 보고 싶을 거야

translation.en: -[sighs] -The point is, I think it would be good

translation.en: for you to be in the world around kids your own age.
Honey, you're wearing a boa around your neck.
translation.ko: 도라, 넌 보아뱀을 목에 두르고 있잖아

translation.en: -It's a boa, as a boa. -That's funny.
[Elena] Honey, there's something else we gotta discuss.
-[sighs] -We're gonna have a talk. About the dangers of the big city.

And some of these parties, they're-- they're called "raves."
translation.ko: 그런 파티 중에는 '광란의 파티'라는 게 있는데

Yeah, and they-- they love glow sticks

The music is-- It sounds like this.
-♪ Go get it ♪ -[imitates loud dance beat]
Yeah, it's very aggressive. Very aggressive.
Well-- Well, be careful. That-- That's what we want to say.
-I should've just said that. -I think it would've been easier.
Honey, here's your satellite phone. Call us anytime.

translation.en: Oh, honey, you have the whole world to explore!

-Dora, no monkeys in the city. -[Boots groans]
It's nice to meet you. Hi!
What if we don't recognize her?
-I don't think that's gonna be a problem. -Excuse me! Sorry!
translation.ko: - 그건 문제가 안 되겠는데요 - 실례해요, 죄송합니다!

translation.en: Hi! I missed you guys so much.
Wow! You're so skinny and tall! Like a palmito tree.

translation.en: You don't even look like you.

translation.ko: 아이고, 도라! 우리 귀염둥이 드디어 왔구나, 왔어! 할머니!

Yeah, my parents thought you'd like it.

OneLink Shelter System with DoubleNest Hammock.

Daintree? Yasuni? El Yunque? Hoh? Tongass? Kakum?

translation.en: But I believe that with focused conservation
and plant-based diets, we can help the rainforests thrive again.

translation.en: Why are you smart? And what are you doing in my school?

[gasps] Oh, so she must be very admired by her peers.

-[bell rings] -What's that? Is there a problem?
That's the morning bell. We're late now.
You don't want to talk to him, either, okay?
Okay, let's see who did the reading last night.
and why is this story still significant today?
Hola. I'm Dora. I'm Diego's cousin.
And Moby Dick is a whale.
The novel exemplifies the Western writer's
translation.ko: 이 소설은 식민지화한 토착 문화에 대한 서양 작가의

translation.en: nostalgic appropriation of colonized indigenous cultures,
translation.ko: 이 소설은 식민지화한 토착 문화에 대한 서양 작가의 향수 어린 전용을 전형적으로 보여줌으로

translation.en: which explains its reified status in American fiction today.

translation.en: Where did you transfer from, Dora?
My parents are both professors. I do a lot of reading.
It looks like we have a new star in the class.
Not sure I made myself clear earlier.

translation.en: But if you're going to take a shot at the queen, you better not miss.

translation.en: There is nothing more dangerous than a wounded animal.

translation.en: A lot of things are more dangerous than a wounded animal.
-A healthy one, for a start. -Stop! Just… stop.

translation.en: ♪ If there's a place you gotta go ♪
♪ I'm the one you need to know I'm the map ♪

translation.en: -[speaking Spanish] -We're doing great. But listen carefully.

Mm. Have you tried this? It's incredible!
Where are you? Please call me.
[automated voice] Please leave a message at the tone.

Miss you, miss Boots. Miss everything.

[gasps] I love this song! You want to dance?

translation.en: I can hold my breath for seven minutes, though.
My parents left me unsupervised at the community pool a lot.
translation.ko: 부모님께서 동네 풀장에 나를 혼자 잘 두셨거든

translation.en: Pretending to drown is a good way to get attention.

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. She's going to have to transfer schools.

translation.en: [all chanting] Dance, Diego, dance! Dance, Diego, dance!
At least I got people dancing and clapping.

translation.en: And you've been here for weeks. How do you not see that?

translation.en: I see it. I'm not stupid. I--
But-- But I have to be myself. That's all I know how to do.
translation.ko: 하지만 난 나답게 굴어야 해 그거밖에 모른단 말이야

translation.en: Diego, we used to be so close. Why are things so different now?

translation.en: Because, Dora, this isn't the jungle, where you can just do whatever you want

translation.en: and be best friends with a monkey.
Okay? This is high school. It's life or death.
And it was hard enough already without having to take care of the class weirdo.

translation.en: Sometimes we all need to hide. No?

translation.en: [sighs] I guess, I never felt lonely
when I was by myself in the jungle.
But now that I'm surrounded by kids…
I feel alone all the time.
You are familia, mi amor. Huh?
no more than the rest of us.
Let's get you some frijolitos, okay?
[man] Okay, here's the scavenger hunt list.
Team up in groups of four and go get some photos.
Oh, and if anybody needs me, I'll be in the cafeteria…

translation.en: -[Dora] Can I be on your team? -[Sammy] Do you guys need a fourth person?
translation.ko: 너희 팀에 들어가도 돼? 너희 팀에 1명 더 필요해?

translation.en: [Dora] Can I be on your team?
-[Diego] Hey, guys. -[Dora] Can I be on your team?
[scoffs] You've got to be kidding me.
There's something really icy happening between you two.
-Was it the Disco Dork-a dance? -Well, I'm glad you brought it up--
translation.ko: 디스코 도카 춤 때문이야? - 그 얘기를 해서 말인데… - 농담이야, 관심 없어

translation.en: I'm just kidding, I don't actually care.
translation.ko: - 그 얘기를 해서 말인데… - 농담이야, 관심 없어

translation.en: Okay. "Find something that's more than 1,000 years old."
"Oldest relic gets two extra points." Come on!
Oh, my gosh. Could you be any bossier?
translation.ko: 맙소사 너 진짜 코가 하늘을 찌르네

translation.en: What's next? "Shrill?" Or am I being too difficult for you?
translation.ko: 다음은 뭔데? '앙칼지다?' 아니면 내가 너무 어렵니?

translation.en: You left that out of your Misogyny 101 class.

translation.en: What? Do you have something to say?
I'm just so scared right now.
[Dora] Hey, what about this Egyptian exhibit?
Anything Egyptian would be the oldest relic by far.
I think I may be able to help you.
You were looking at the Egyptian posters.
-When does it open? -Oh, that's the problem, two weeks.
They're unloading it today in the basement.
If it means that much to you, there may be a way for you to get down there.

translation.en: [Sammy] This best not be some wild goose chase.
translation.ko: 잡지도 못하는 기러기 쫓기면 가만 안 둬

translation.en: I sure hope it is. I love chasing wild geese.
translation.ko: 난 그러면 좋겠어 기러기 잡는 거 좋아하거든

translation.en: Until you catch one. Then it is not fun.
A caught goose is just the meanest!
Well, it's grouped by origin, so
translation.ko: 기원에 따라 분리되어 있으니까 고대 이집트는 이 복도 어딜 텐데

translation.en: the Ancient Egyptian stuff should be in this aisle.
translation.ko: 고대 이집트는 이 복도 어딜 텐데

translation.en: And I can totally explain why I'm here.
translation.ko: 제가 왜 여기 있는지 설명할 수 있어요

translation.en: Look what I found sneaking around.
translation.ko: 몰래 다니는 걸 찾았지 누군지 봐

translation.en: -Wait, you already knew my name? -[footsteps approach]
I guess we win the scavenger hunt.
-[Diego] What's going on? -[Randy] Is this a scavenger hunt?
[Dora] What are you guys doing in here?
Sleep tight, Dora, and when you wake up,
you will help us find your parents, and then Parapata.
translation.ko: 네 부모 찾는 걸 도와줘야겠다 파라파타도

translation.en: I think we're being unloaded from a plane.
We're not on a plane. We can't--
Oh, my God, we're on a plane! Oh--
We've left the country without ID. We need to alert the US consulate.
translation.ko: 신분증도 없이 출국했어 영사관에 알려야 해

translation.en: -They're treasure hunters? -Why did I take Mandarin?
translation.ko: 보물 사냥꾼들이야? 중국어는 괜히 배웠네 대체 무슨 말인데?
중국어는 괜히 배웠네 대체 무슨 말인데?

translation.en: We gotta get out of here.
Oh, look, Dora brought a knife on the field trip, everybody.
translation.ko: 도라 좀 봐 현장 학습에 칼을 챙겨 왔네

translation.en: Okay. I am not here. I'm an avatar. [whimpers]
translation.ko: 여기 있는 건 내가 아니라 내 화신이야

translation.en: -Who are you? -I'm a friend of your parents.
Come with me if you want to live--
-[Sammy] Where did he go? -Did… did he die?
I'm okay! I'm okay. I need your help.
But we have to run. Now!
[Sammy] My parents did not sign a permission slip for the jungle!
translation.ko: 부모님께서 정글 가는 건 허락 안 하셨는데

translation.en: Where's the museum? Why, why, why?
-[Dora] How do we get out of here? -I don't know!
Getting you out of the box was as far as my plan went.
-[Diego] What kind of rescue is this? -It's the only one you've got.
[Dora] Hey! That fox just swiped my map!
Where is it? Where is it? Where is it?
What part of, "The fox just swiped my map" don't you understand? Come on, help me!
translation.ko: '저 여우가 내 지도를 가져갔어'가 어려워? 도와줘

translation.en: Gotcha! There you are, my little friend.
-Now what do we do? -Come on, come on!
-Where did our rescuer go? -[Randy] He ran away!
-[man] Get in! -[Swiper] I'm not joking, man!
Viper, get the truck! Don't let them escape!
translation.ko: 바이퍼, 트럭 가져와! 도망치게 두면 안 돼

translation.en: This is the only road for miles. Keep your eyes peeled.
translation.ko: 한참 동안 이 길밖에 없어 눈 똑바로 뜨고 찾아

translation.en: I was just kidnapped and chased by bad guys!
And a fox with a mask! Everyone saw that, right?
translation.ko: 가면을 쓴 여우도 있었고 다들 봤지?

translation.en: Like, why does that fox need to remain anonymous?
translation.ko: 그 여우가 얼굴을 감출 일이 뭐가 있어?

translation.en: Who is gonna recognize one specific fox?
You were an infant the last time I saw you.
translation.ko: 내가 마지막으로 봤을 때 넌 갓난아기였단다

translation.en: My name is Alejandro Gutierrez. I'm a professor of ancient languages
translation.ko: 난 알레한드로 구티에레스야 페루 리마의 산마르코스 대학 고대 언어 교수야

translation.en: at San Marcos University in Lima, Peru.
translation.ko: 페루 리마의 산마르코스 대학 고대 언어 교수야

translation.en: Your parents and I were in constant contact during their time here.
translation.ko: 부모님께서 여기 계실 때 연락하고 지냈는데

translation.en: Then two weeks ago, your parents' calls stopped.
-That means silence. -Yeah. I got that one.
They haven't answered any of my sat phone call for weeks, either.
translation.ko: 제 위성 전화에도 몇 주째 답이 없으세요

translation.en: Your father sent me this just a week before, in case I could help.
translation.ko: 내 도움이 필요할 때를 대비해 한 주 전 아빠가 이걸 보냈어

translation.en: [Alejandro] So I came here to make sure they were okay.
I've been staking it out, hoping for a sign from them.
translation.ko: 혹시 부모님이 나타나는지 숨어서 기다리고 있다가

translation.en: [stutters] And then I saw you poke your head out of that crate
translation.ko: 상자에서 네가 고개를 내미는 걸 보고

translation.en: and I-- I said to myself, "Dora!"
But how did you recognize me?
Well, you look sort of exactly the same.
But I'm afraid I have no idea where to find your parents.
translation.ko: 그런데 네 부모님 행방은 정말 모르겠어

translation.en: Don't worry. I can track my parents in the jungle.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마세요, 정글에서 부모님 흔적은 찾을 수 있어요

translation.en: Or we could call the local police
and-- and have them come rescue us with, like, a SWAT team.
translation.ko: 우리 구하러 오라고 하는 건? 특수 기동대 같은 거?

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah, that sounds like another solid option.
translation.ko: 그래, 그것도 아주 좋은 방법 같은데

translation.en: Hello? 911? Can you please come and get us?
We're at the corner of Rain and Forest.
Okay, I get it! I just want to go home.
translation.ko: 좋아요, 알았다고요 그냥 집에 가고 싶을 뿐이에요

translation.en: This is the kind of place where people die.
translation.ko: 보통 사람들이 이런 데서 죽어 나가거든

translation.en: I mean, in a way, every place is the kind of place where people die.
translation.ko: 어떤 면에선 어디를 가도 사람들은 죽어 나가

translation.en: -Okay, well, that's a bummer notion. -Guys, guys.
Listen, finding Dora's parents is our best chance of getting home.
translation.ko: 도라의 부모님을 찾는 게 집으로 가는 최고의 방법이야

translation.en: My aunt and uncle will know what to do.
translation.ko: 우리 고모랑 고모부는 방법을 아실 거야

translation.en: Dora's my cousin, I can't just let her go off with some
translation.ko: 도라는 내 사촌이야 방금 만나 알지도 못하고

translation.en: strange and anxious man we just met.
translation.ko: 초조해 보이는 사람과 가게 둘 순 없어

translation.en: Now let's go find Dora's parents.
[Dora] Look! In there! That's their car!
Here. This is it. Our family symbol.
-This is where they started hiking. -Are we there?
translation.ko: 여기서 하이킹을 시작하셨어요 우리 다 왔어?

translation.en: Where are your parents? I don't see your parents.
translation.ko: 네 부모님은 어디 계셔? 난 안 보이는데

translation.en: We can't go any further by car.
-The jungle gets too dense. -So, how do we--
We must enter the jungle on foot.
Luckily, I prepared for this possibility.
Okay, I may have gone a little overboard on supplies.
translation.ko: 그래, 뭐 좀 심하게 챙기긴 했어

translation.en: I-- I'm not going in first, though. You go first, Dora. It feels right.
translation.ko: 난 먼저 안 가 네가 먼저 가, 도라 그게 맞는 것 같아

translation.en: [Dora] You all have nothing to worry about.
Just don't touch anything. Or breathe too deeply.
translation.ko: 그냥 아무것도 만지지 마 너무 깊게 호흡하지도 말고

translation.en: [Randy] Are you sure your parents went this way?
Legend tells of a deadly ancient militia
dedicated to protecting Parapata from outside eyes.
translation.ko: 파라파타를 지키는 지독한 고대 민병이 있었대

translation.en: No one has seen Los Guardianes Perdidos…
-Ancient Inca. Impressive. -[Sammy] What does it mean?
Okay, I am ready for my parents to come and get me now.
translation.ko: 난 이제 부모님이 오셔서 날 데려가면 좋겠어

translation.en: [Alejandro] You have nothing to worry about.
I promise. I mean, there's no need to overreact.
translation.ko: 약속해 과잉 반응을 보일 이유가 전혀 없거든

translation.en: Get it off! Get it off! Get it off! [grunts]
And that was just an example of the dangers of overreacting.
translation.ko: 이게 바로 과잉 반응의 위험을 예를 들어 보여준 거야

translation.en: -[Sammy whimpers] -[Dora] You okay? Fine. Totally fine.
Hey. I found one of those red loops.
-We must be getting close. -Oh, thank you, thank you!
Or was. I mean, this is their stuff.
Oh, Boots, I'm so happy to see you!
Of course, she knows this monkey.
Oh, sorry. Um, this is Boots. Boots, these are, um, my friends.
translation.ko: 미안, 여긴 부츠야 부츠, 내 친구들

translation.en: -They're here to help me. -No. We're here to get saved.
translation.ko: 나 도와주러 온 거야 아니지 구조받으러 온 거잖아

translation.en: Oh, and FYI, we are not friends.
Still, I can track my parents better than any mercenaries.
translation.ko: 그래도 제가 부모님을 더 잘 추적할 수 있어요

translation.en: We just have to get to them first.
Uh. May we stop for a moment? I need to do a thing.
translation.ko: 잠깐만 좀 멈추지? 뭐 할 게 있는데

translation.en: -You have to poo. -[scoffs] No. That isn't it.
Of course I have to poo! I haven't pooed in 48 hours!
translation.ko: 당연히 똥 누고 싶지! 48시간이나 못 눴단 말이야

translation.en: I'm sweating, and every step is agony!
Well, don't look at me cover your ears!
translation.ko: 날 보지 말고 다들 귀 막아!

translation.en: Probably should've said "cover your ears" before you said "poo" like, 47 times.
translation.ko: 계속 '똥'이라고 하기 전에 귀를 막으라고 했었어야지

translation.en: -[scoffs] -[Dora] There's no need to be afraid.
-Let's turn this into a song. -Let's not.
You know what? I think it's passed.
Why don't we just go back to the group, and we can just--
Seriously? You had that in your backpack, too?
♪ It's time to dig the poo hole ♪
♪ Just grab a shovel It's a piece of cake ♪
♪ Make sure the hole is deep And there isn't a snake ♪
translation.ko: 너무 얕게 파지 마 뱀도 있나 보고

translation.en: ♪ I'm telling you this So you will be wiser ♪
♪ And don't forget It's a natural fertilizer ♪
I believe in you, Sammy. I believe that you can do this.
translation.ko: 난 널 믿어, 새미 할 수 있을 거라고 말이야

translation.en: Also, medically, you have to do this.
There's nothing to be afraid of.
Not good. Not good at all.
Real arrows flying at us! Real arrows flying at us!
The curse is gonna perish us. We're gonna perish all over the place!
translation.ko: 그 저주로 다 죽을 거야 여기에서 죽고 말 거라고!

translation.en: I'm hit! They hit me! I'm bleeding out!
translation.ko: 나 화살에 맞았어 피가 철철 흘러!

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no! No, it's a juice box. It's just a juice box.
I think we're safe. For now.
-[Sammy screams] -Not safe. Not safe! Not safe!
[Randy] I want to go home! I want to go home!
translation.ko: 나 집에 갈래! 집에 가고 싶어!

translation.en: because I'm… I'm fairly confident I just sustained a…
translation.ko: 심각한 뇌 손상을 입은 것 같아서 말이야

translation.en: a serious brain injury, but I do believe…
translation.ko: 심각한 뇌 손상을 입은 것 같아서 말이야 그런데 아무래도

translation.en: we may have just met Los Guardianes Perdidos.
translation.ko: 방금 '로스 과르디아네스 페르디도스'를 만난 것 같아

translation.en: [Diego] I thought you said they were just legends.
These are the same Inca sun symbols that were on those totems.
translation.ko: 토템에 있던 잉카의 태양 상징과 똑같아

translation.en: So these are like, legit arrows?
Okay? No, I'm not okay, okay? I want to go home!
translation.ko: 괜찮냐고? 아니, 안 괜찮아 됐어? 난 집에 가고 싶다고!

translation.en: I want to be staring at my phone, in an ice-cold room,
translation.ko: 얼음장 같은 방에서 이가 시리게 찬 커피를 마시며

translation.en: And I know that makes me sound real basic, but that is what I want!
translation.ko: 정말 단순하게 들리겠지만 그게 내가 원하는 거야

translation.en: Oh, and by the way, the poo song lied.
translation.ko: 참, 그 똥 노래는 완전히 거짓말이더라

translation.en: Yeah, it was totally dangerous, arrows rained down on me.
And I can't even storm off 'cause this jungle will eat me!
translation.ko: 박차고 나갈 수도 없어 정글이 날 집어삼킬 테니까!

translation.en: ♪ It's okay to freak out sometimes ♪
Are you here to yell at me, too?
Nah. Actually, I'm here to avoid getting yelled at.
translation.ko: 아니 누가 나한테 고함칠까 봐 도망 온 거야

translation.en: It's scary to be responsible for other people.
translation.ko: 다른 사람을 책임지는 건 무서운 일이야

translation.en: Look, I know she can be like, a real pain in the butt sometimes, but…
translation.ko: 있잖아, 새미가 정말 재수 없게 굴 때도 있지만

translation.en: she's not all bad, I guess.
You have an attraction for her.
No, I definitely never said that.
translation.ko: 난 절대 그런 말 한 적 없어

translation.en: can often accelerate the mating process in many species!
translation.ko: 많은 종이 짝짓기를 서두르는 경향이 있거든

translation.en: Okay, no. Just slow your roll.
And please don't ever say the word "mating" again.
Let's just get out of here.
-Are we even going the right way? -[Boots laughs]
[Viper] I scouted the area. There's a freshly cut path to the north,
translation.ko: 주위를 둘러보고 왔어 북쪽에 최근 정리한 길이 있고 동쪽에는 유적지가 있더군
북쪽에 최근 정리한 길이 있고 동쪽에는 유적지가 있더군

translation.en: [Powell] Did you find any more of their markings?
translation.ko: - 그 둘의 표식은 더 찾았고? - 아니

translation.en: -[Viper] No. -[Powell] Okay, then we head north. [Viper] That's the path they took.
translation.ko: - 좋아, 그러면 북쪽으로 간다 - 그들도 그쪽으로 향했어

translation.en: What, you're scared of monkeys now?
[Viper] Monkeys can carry three times their body weight.
translation.ko: 원숭이는 자기 체중의 3배를 옮길 수 있어

translation.en: So that's a yes? Viper's scared of monkeys.
[Randy] They're definitely dead. It's just you and me now.
translation.ko: 분명히 다 죽었어 이제 너랑 나뿐이야

translation.en: -Of course, we'll have to start a family. -We are not starting a family.
translation.ko: 물론 가족을 시작해야겠지 가족 시작 안 해

translation.en: Eh, give it a few days.
Uh! Hey! Where have you guys been?
-[Alejandro] Hi, guys. -Look, I'm really sorry, Dora.
We saw the mercenaries. They're ahead of us.
We'll have to follow the mercenaries from a safe distance.
translation.ko: 안전거리를 유지하며 그 용병들을 따라가야 할 거야

translation.en: No. We're not following them. My parents didn't go that way.
translation.ko: 그 사람들 안 따라가요 부모님은 그쪽으로 안 가셨죠

translation.en: My father says that the way to Parapata passes through an opera house.
translation.ko: 아빠가 오페라 하우스를 지나야 파라파타로 간다고 하셨어

translation.en: The opera house was built hundreds of years ago
translation.ko: 수백 년 전 고무 산업이 호황일 때

translation.en: by Europeans during the rubber boom.
There'll be nothing but ruins by now.
This is the way they went.
It doesn't look like any opera singers have been here for a while.
translation.ko: 오페라 가수가 안 온 지 한참 된 것 같은데

translation.en: The Europeans may have built it, but…
the jungle has taken it back.
Why does the ground feel like chocolate pudding?
I ate a lot of frijoles and chimichangas.
Wait. Anyone else notice the walls are getting higher?
translation.ko: 잠깐만 벽이 높아지는 것 같지 않아?

translation.en: -You got to be kidding me! -[Randy] Quicksand really exists?
I thought it was just a video game thing. Like Pitfall!
translation.ko: '피트폴'처럼 비디오 게임에나 나오는 건 줄 알았지

translation.en: -It's a classic. -How do we get out of this stuff?
Okay, rule number one of quicksand, don't panic.
translation.ko: 퀵샌드 규칙 1번 절대 당황하지 말 것

translation.en: You'll only get sucked in further. Lie down flat on your back.
translation.ko: 더 많이 가라앉을 거야 등을 대고 누워

translation.en: You have to distribute your weight.
[Alejandro] No, no, no. I'm not doing that.
Yeah. No, this feels super wrong.
translation.ko: 그래 이건 진짜 아닌 것 같다

translation.en: [Dora] Now make little movements with your legs
to make space for the water to get between the sand.
translation.ko: 모래 사이에 물이 찰 공간을 만들어

translation.en: And once your legs are free, simply backstroke out of the quicksand.
Oh, give me a break. We're gonna die in here.
translation.ko: 웃기지 마 우린 다 여기서 죽을 거야

translation.en: Look, look! It's working! It's working!
translation.ko: 좀 봐, 효과가 있어 되나 봐!

translation.en: -Help me! -Alejandro, you have to stop moving.
Why have you all gone quiet?
Cha! [spits] No, no, no! Not on the face.
-Not on the face. Ah! [yells in Spanish] -Oh!
-It's another male. They will now fight. -No, no!
translation.ko: 또 다른 수컷이에요 이제 서로 싸울 거예요 안 돼!

translation.en: I'm not sure those guys are fighting.
translation.ko: 쟤들 싸우는 게 아닌 것 같은데

translation.en: They are not fighting. They are mating!
-Get it off! -Quick, someone go get a branch.
[Diego] It's a jungle full of trees and I can't find a branch.
translation.ko: 나무로 가득한 정글에 어떻게 나뭇가지 하나가 없어?

translation.en: [Dora yelps] Okay, everyone. One, two, three! Ah!
I thought I was gonna die.
I thought I was gonna die.
It's so awkward when adults cry.
You just don't know where to look.
I'm so sorry. My whole life is a lie.
-No. No. No. -No, yes, I am. Yes.
No, you are not a bad guy. No one is, deep down inside.
translation.ko: 나쁜 사람 아니에요 진짜 나쁜 사람은 없단 말이에요

translation.en: And she doesn't seem very interested in helping me find them.
translation.ko: 딱히 부모님 찾는 걸 도와주고 싶어 하지도 않아

translation.en: Perhaps she knows how to get to Parapata.
[Sammy yelps] She seemed pretty interested in that.
Are they supposed to be us?
-Everyone thinks that was bad? -Yeah, a little bit.
She said anyone seeking Parapata is cursed.
But she also said she knows how to get you guys back downriver.
translation.ko: 하지만 너희들을 강 아래로 데려다줄 수 있다는데

translation.en: Yes. Yes! I am saved! I…
mean… [clears throat] …only if you are cool without us, obviously.
translation.ko: 그게 물론 우리가 없어도 네가 괜찮아야지, 뭐

translation.en: You got me into this mess, but I guess you're getting me out of it,

translation.en: This is where we split up.
I, uh… I hope you don't die or anything.
-[speaking Quechua] -Why is she in such a hurry to get us out of here?

translation.en: No, no, no, come on! We've got to warn them!

translation.en: Not something you see every day.
[Dora] Well, she said this was the way we had to go.
Yes! Yes! Yes! We did it!
-We're in a spore field! -Don't breathe it in!
translation.ko: 여긴 홀씨 밭이에요! - 숨 들이마시지 마요! - 여기서 빨리 나가자!

translation.en: -Let's get out of here! -It's okay. It's okay.
translation.ko: - 숨 들이마시지 마요! - 여기서 빨리 나가자! 괜찮아요

translation.en: If these were poisonous spores, we'd all be dead by now.

translation.en: I don't need these clothes anymore!
I'm sure this will pass. It's fine!
Hi there, Map! Oh, I thought I lost you.
translation.ko: 안녕, 지도야! 널 잃어버린 줄 알았어

translation.en: You can never lose me. I'm always with you!
translation.ko: 날 잃어버릴 순 없지 난 항상 너와 함께하잖아

translation.en: -But it's nice to make your acquaintance. -Ah.
Take my hand. Let's try this together.
-[Randy] What do we do? -[Sammy] Oh, we should sing her a song.
♪ Please be alive, Dora, don't be dead ♪
translation.ko: 제발 살아줘, 도라 죽으면 안 돼

translation.en: ♪ That sounds like something That you would have said ♪
-Oh, I'm not very good at this. -[Randy] It worked!
translation.ko: - 나 이런 거 잘 못해 - 효과가 있어

translation.en: sometimes a song's the best idea.
translation.ko: 어쩔 땐 노래도 괜찮은 것 같아

translation.en: But not often. Oh, and don't tell anyone I did that.
translation.ko: 그렇게 자주는 말고 내가 그랬다고 아무한테도 말하지 마

translation.en: I never forgot about the jungle.
I'm glad I'm here with you, Dora.
translation.ko: 여기 너랑 같이 있어서 정말 기뻐, 도라

translation.en: this is our next adventure, prima.
I-- I had the weirdest dream.
The entrance to Parapata should be somewhere in these mountains.
translation.ko: 파라파타 입구가 이 산 어딘가에 있을 거야

translation.en: Oh, that's great. For the first time,
I'm actually feeling really good about how things are--
This was all hidden down here?
[sighs] Well, great. Now we're stuck in a hole.
But the stars aren't in the correct place.
I don't think this is a jungle puzzle.
Mainly because there's no such thing as a jungle puzzle.
Listen, I've seen several movies about the jungle.
translation.ko: 정글에 관한 영화를 여러 편 봤다고요

translation.en: To solve this, we have to get the stars in the right place.
translation.ko: 이걸 풀려면 별을 제자리로 옮겨야 해요

translation.en: And when we do, these big stone wheels will turn
translation.ko: 그렇게 하면 큰 돌 바퀴가 돌면서 보물이 모습을 드러낼 거예요

translation.en: and the treasure will be revealed. [chuckles] It's gonna be awesome.
translation.ko: 그렇게 하면 큰 돌 바퀴가 돌면서 보물이 모습을 드러낼 거예요 진짜 멋질 거예요

translation.en: I just need to figure out how to move the first piece.
translation.ko: 첫 조각을 움직일 방법만 알아내면 된다고요

translation.en: Are you sure you should be touching that?
That does not sound like a good noise.
Oh, wait. The stars are in the right position.
-I was just looking at it the wrong way. -It's still a jungle puzzle, right?
translation.ko: 내가 잘못 보고 있었어 그래도 여전히 정글 퍼즐이지?

translation.en: Oh! Oh! I don't think this is a jungle puzzle.
-This is a puquio. -[Sammy] What the flip is a puquio?
Inca engineers built some of the most elaborate irrigation systems ever devised.
translation.ko: 역사상 가장 정교한 관개를 만든 게 잉카 기술자들이거든

translation.en: Ah! I'm trying to find the off switch!
Okay, if this is an aqueduct, we just need to somehow open the sluice gate.
translation.ko: 좋아, 이게 송수로라면 어떻게든 수문만 열면 돼

translation.en: How do you know so much about aqueducts?
translation.ko: 송수로에 관해 왜 이렇게 많이 알아?

translation.en: We learned about them last year in history class.
You were there. It was the week you wore a lot of red and pink.
translation.ko: 너도 그 수업 들었잖아 빨강과 분홍을 주로 입었는데

translation.en: I look at you a lot, okay?
We need to find the sluice gate. Where is the sluice gate?

translation.en: That must be the mechanism that controls the sluice gate.

translation.en: That's what it's called, okay? We have bigger thing to deal with right now!

translation.en: -[gasps] -Who here can hold their breath for seven minutes?
It's hard to tell with all of this water,
but I'm assuming none of your hands are raised.
can somebody please tell me what's going on?
translation.ko: 대체 무슨 일인지 누가 말 좀 해줄래?

translation.en: We were kidnapped by mercenaries who were after Parapata.
Oh, I did something epic! I'm basically a superhero!

Alejandro saved us from them. And he's with us!
-Alejandro, from the university. -You-- You sent him your journal.
translation.ko: 대학에서 나온 알레한드로요 아빠 일기도 보내셨잖아요

translation.en: My journal was stolen days before the expedition.
You don't know him, do you?

translation.ko: - 이리 와, 얘들아 - 델타 접선 장소

translation.en: -You lied to me. -No, no, no, no, no.
-No, I outwitted you… -That's the same thing.
…as I have outwitted every adversary that came before you.
translation.ko: 네 앞에 나타나는 모든 적에게 선수 친 것처럼

translation.en: Who would have believed that my greatest achievement,
translation.ko: 누가 믿을까? 성공적인 보물 사냥꾼 경력을

translation.en: the final act in a prosperous treasure-hunting career
would find me squaring off against a socially inept jungle nerd…
translation.ko: 사회 부적응자인 정글 머저리와 고등학생 머저리 셋이랑…

translation.en: -Hey, hey, hey! -…and three high school losers.
translation.ko: - 이봐! - 맞장 뜨는 게 될지 말이야

translation.en: I don't know them, so whatever.
you will lead me to Parapata.
But you can't get inside. It's impenetrable.
You wouldn't want anything to happen to her…
So, if everyone just plays nice, I'll get my gold,
translation.ko: 다들 말만 잘 들으면 난 황금을 차지하고

translation.en: and you'll be on your way home safe and sound.
translation.ko: 너희는 집으로 무사히 돌아가게 될 거야

translation.en: So, make the smart choice. Hmm?
I'm so sorry. This is all my fault.
If we do what he says, we'll be okay.
-We love you so much! -[Elena] It's our fault.
Can you all shut up back there?
I've had to listen to your mindless positivity for three days!
Your relentless good-natured spirit is a holy nightmare!
translation.ko: 네 그 끈질긴 착한 마음씨는 정말 신성할 정도로 악몽이야!

translation.en: So just shut up! Shut up!
translation.ko: 그러니 그 입 좀 닥쳐! 닥치라고!

translation.en: -I'm so sorry about that. -Yeah-- Shut up!
-[Elena] No, no, no. It, uh-- -No, no, no.
[Alejandro] We make camp tonight by those gates.
Papi wants us to do what they say.
translation.ko: 아빠가 저들이 시키는 대로 하라고 하셨다고

translation.en: Wow, it really is the deadliest weapon.
[Powell] Viper! What's going on back there?
Take the professors to the gate.
I spent days with these brats.
I know what they'll do next.
So what if he's a double-crossing mercenary treasure hunter?
translation.ko: 이중 첩자에 용병인 보물 사냥꾼이면 어때서?

translation.ko: 부모님이 보물을 보여주면 우릴 놔줄 텐데

translation.en: He's gonna kill them… isn't he?
He's gonna kill all of us.
But you're not a grownup either, Dora.
You're a teenager. It's a super confusing time.
But the fact is, you're right, you can't do it by yourself.
translation.ko: 하지만 혼자 못 한다는 건 맞는 말이지

translation.en: Good news is you have friends now.

translation.en: Boots. Hey, Boots. Boots, come on. Boots.
-Hey, did you guys hear that? -Uh. You talking to a monkey?
translation.ko: - 너희도 들었어? - 네가 원숭이한테 말하는 거?

translation.en: -[Boots squeals] -No, no, Boots was talking to me.
Come on, guys, we have to save my parents.
How? We are teenagers armed with yo-yos.
All Alejandro wants is the gold.
And if we can get inside Parapata, we can trade the treasure for my parents.
translation.ko: 우리가 파라파타로 들어가서 금이랑 부모님을 교환하면 돼

translation.en: But how are we going to get into Parapata? We're gonna figure it out. Together.
translation.ko: 하지만 어떻게 파라파타에 들어간다는 거야? 함께 방법을 찾아보면 돼

translation.en: ♪ Guarding the gate I'm guarding the gate ♪
♪ Guarding the gate I'm guarding the gate ♪
Would you stop singing? It's unprofessional.
translation.ko: 노래 좀 그만해 좀 전문적으로 굴어

♪ Guarding the gate I'm guarding the gate ♪

translation.en: I was wrong about jungle puzzles, okay?

translation.en: Maybe we pull 'em all at once?
At least if we die, we all get to die together, right?

좋아, 이제 증명됐네 영화는 다 거짓말이야

translation.en: It's a real freaking jungle puzzle.
That is so awesome! I'm sorry I doubted you, movies.
[Dora] I've never seen anything like it.
This is the discovery of a lifetime! [chuckles]
[Diego] I guess this must be the temple.
This is totally where the gold's hidden.

translation.ko: 저기 봐! 태양 빛이 들어오게 벽에 뚫린 곳이 있어

translation.ko: 그릇 각도를 맞춰서 맞는 곳에 비추면 돼

translation.en: -[Dora] Clearly, they loved geometry. -[Sammy] They fit together symmetrically.
translation.ko: - 기하학을 진짜 좋아했나 봐 - 대칭으로 딱 맞아

translation.en: [gasps] A door! It's opening a door, guys.
Just hold the beam until the doors are fully open.
translation.ko: 문이 다 열릴 때까지 계속 비추고 있어

translation.en: What is that? Some sort of Ancient Inca group hug?
translation.ko: 저게 뭐야? 고대 잉카족 단체 포옹이라도 돼?

translation.en: -Oh, guys. You might want to look up. -Huh?
The jungle puzzles are turning on us!
Dora, Dora! Try and pull it open.
[Diego] It's like it goes on forever.
-At the end, is that-- -A giant golden monkey? [laughs]
translation.ko: - 저 끝에 있는 게… - 거대한 황금 원숭이냐고?

translation.en: [Randy] We did it, guys. We found the treasure.
Wait, these skulls, they look like a--
Okay! Okay, I know what we have to do.
When we get to the bottom of the hallway, we have to jump at the same time.
translation.ko: 복도 바닥에 도착하면 전부 동시에 뛰는 거야

translation.en: -It's too far! -What? We will never make it!
translation.ko: - 너무 멀어! - 뭐? 절대 성공 못 해

translation.en: No, it's an illusion, okay? Trust me.
-[breathes heavily] -It's okay, Sammy. Just let go. It's okay.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 새미 그냥 놔, 걱정하지 마

translation.en: It was a forced perspective. A trick to fool thieves and trespassers!
translation.ko: 인위적 원근법이었어 도둑과 침입자들을 막으려는 속임수

translation.en: -Good job, Diego. -Ancient Inca group hug for the win, guys.
translation.ko: 정말 잘했어, 디에고 승리를 자축하며 고대 잉카 단체 포옹하자

translation.en: [Randy] The monkey looked a lot more impressive back there.
translation.ko: 저 뒤에서 봤을 땐 원숭이가 훨씬 멋졌는데

translation.en: -Is that an emerald? -[Sammy] It's bigger than a basketball!
I think we found the treasure, guys.
of that which is most revered."
What did the Inca revere the most?
Thanks for getting through the tough stuff for me.
translation.ko: 나 대신 힘든 걸 다 거쳐줘서 정말 고맙다

translation.en: Once again, I only had to follow Miss Know-It-All,
translation.ko: 다시 한번 뭐든 아는 체하는 이 아가씨만 따랐는데

translation.en: and she led me straight to the gold. [laughs]
The answer to the puzzle is obvious.
The Incas built monuments to their gods with it.
translation.ko: 잉카족들은 자기 신들을 위해 금으로 기념비를 지었어

translation.en: Gold is as close to touching the sun as the Incas could get.
translation.ko: 잉카인들에게는 금이 태양을 만지는 거와 다름없었거든

translation.en: I beat you, I won! I beat you, I won! Ha!
translation.ko: 내가 이겼지롱 너희가 아니라 내가 이겼어!

translation.en: The treasure is going to be mine!
You were wrong about me, Alejandro.

translation.ko: 내가 뭐든 아는 체하는 게 아니에요

translation.en: But by now, I do know you.
translation.ko: 하지만 이쯤 되니까 당신은 잘 알게 됐죠

translation.en: I knew that you would follow us in here.

translation.en: And I knew that you would let us take all the risk for you.
translation.ko: 당신을 대신해서 모든 위험을 감수하게 둘 거란 것도요

translation.en: I knew the final Inca test would carry
translation.ko: 잉카의 마지막 시험을 실패하는 자에게 비참한 결과가 있을 걸 알았죠

translation.en: dire consequences for those who should fail it.
translation.ko: 실패하는 자에게 비참한 결과가 있을 걸 알았죠

translation.en: Which is why we are over here, and you…

글쎄요 바로 거기 서 있는 거예요

translation.en: Help me! Get in here! Now!
My mercenaries are on their way.
It's fine. How cool is this?
Look at these guys, that's a real crossbow.
translation.ko: 이 사람들 좀 봐 진짜 석궁이야

translation.en: Honey. That's a real crossbow, yep.
It's the Lost Guardians of Parapata.
Ridiculous! There are no lost guardians. I made them up.
translation.ko: 말도 안 되는 소리! 잃어버린 수호자 따윈 없어 내가 만들어낸 거라고

translation.en: I think this is when we perish.

translation.ko: - 아니에요, 제발요 - 도라! 이 사람과 한패 아니에요

translation.en: -Be strong, honey, okay? -You choose the right thing.
[Swiper] Say goodbye to your little friend.
translation.ko: 너희 작은 친구와 작별 인사나 해

translation.en: [Alejandro] I knew the answer was water!
Can you give me another go?
I was joking about the gold! Of course not gold!
translation.ko: 금이라고 한 건 농담이었어요 금은 말도 안 되잖아요

translation.en: And you'll never find it now, man!
We gotta go! I love Parapata, but I don't want to be stuck here forever.
translation.ko: 가자, 파라파타가 좋긴 해도 영원히 여기 갇히긴 싫어

translation.en: Should we put up a sign saying, "Choose the water"?
Look, I know we weren't exactly friends when this trip started, but I--
translation.ko: 이 여행을 시작할 땐 딱히 친구가 아니었지만…

translation.en: -Dora's staring at us again, isn't she? -Yeah.
We're going back into the jungle in a few weeks.
translation.ko: 몇 주 후에 다시 정글로 돌아갈 거야
